# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an option object containing no options.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Use this initializer to create the empty option set.

## Creating a compression option

- **init(options:)**: Creates an option object that represents the union of the supplied options.
- **init(identifier:)**: Creates an option object with the given identifier string.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an option object from data in an unarchiver.
